nodes.text: Star Wars Insider 179 is the 157th issue of Star Wars Insider magazine and the eighty-seventh issue published by Titan Magazines. It was released on March 6, 2018. This was the first Star Wars Insider issue to feature Chris Cooper as editor, succeeding Will Salmon.

We follow the villainous journey of Kylo Ren in Star Wars: The Last Jedi.
Rebel Romance – The war-torn love of Star Wars Rebel's Kanan and Hera.
Exclusive red carpet coverage from the London premiere of The Last Jedi.
Droids and Ewoks writer Paul Dini talks about bringing back Boba Fett.
A Classic archive interview with The Empire Strikes Back director Irvin Kershner.
